synopsis.text:
Watch your favorite heroes from Type-Moon's iconic works, including Fate/Stay Night, Tsukihime, and more, as they gather for an extraordinary event in Carnival Phantasm! Held once every decade in a parallel dimension, this carnival brings together characters who would otherwise never cross paths. The grand prize? A wish-granting treasure that could fulfill their deepest desires. But forget about bloody battles; this competition is all about wacky challenges and hilarious situations!

Based on Eri Takenashi's manga, Take Moon, this anime celebrates Type-Moon's 10th anniversary by showcasing various parodies and new stories that poke fun at the original series. From Lancer's misfortune due to his pitiful luck stat to the King of Heroes' surprising submission to a certain King of Knights, expect the unexpected as these legendary characters go head-to-head in a series of outrageous contests.

Get ready to laugh and leave your sanity behind as you dive into the absurd world of Carnival Phantasm, where your favorite characters are brought together in a hilarious rollercoaster ride of events that'll have you begging for more!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
